titles.title: A bill to suspend for a nine month period the duty of certain mixtures of cross-linked sodium polyacrylate polymers.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Executive Comment Requested from State, Treasury, Commerce, Labor, ITC, USTR.

bill.summary: 1/27/1987--Introduced. Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to suspend, through October 31, 1987, the duty on mixtures of two or more organic compounds containing one or more cross-linked sodium polyacrylate polymers.
